content: Key Items are an integral part of the progression in Black Myth: Wukong"). Some of them are placed naturally along the main path through the game. However, quite a few are hidden in secret areas or locked behind optional bosses. These key items can open up new secret areas, spawn new bosses, and, in some cases, allow you to get new loot, upgrades, and resources.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Key_Items.md', within the main section titled 'Key Items'.
The content is as follows:
Key Items are an integral part of the progression in Black Myth: Wukong"). Some of them are placed naturally along the main path through the game. However, quite a few are hidden in secret areas or locked behind optional bosses. These key items can open up new secret areas, spawn new bosses, and, in some cases, allow you to get new loot, upgrades, and resources.
